meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1698.

td.p: Darlynne Burnett, a district manager from Wrightwood, California
Peter Wadhams, a podiatrist originally from Rochester, New York
Bruce Gardner, a veterinarian from Cerritos, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $18,202)

tr.td: AUGUST
GOURMET COOKING
SUNKEN SHIPS
ACTORS & HISTORIC ROLES
SAINTS
VOCABULARY

Peter

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_4', 'clue_DJ_3_4_stuck', '(Darlynne: Who is Toni...)
[Pause.]
(Alex: Finish it up quickly.)
[Pause.]
(Darlynne: I can\'t get it.)
[Time\'s up sound plays.]
(Alex: Oh, Darlynne, you\'re on the right track, and it breaks my heart to have to say this. Who is [*]?)

Toni Morrison

Darlynne
')
